title: NH3+O2 - Enthalpy of rxn from heats of formation

content.prompt:
4 NH3(g) + 3 O2(g) → 2 N2(g) + 6 H2O(g)

If the standard molar heats of formation of ammonia, NH3(g), and gaseous water, H2O(g), are -46 kJ/mol and -242 kJ/mol, respectively, what is the value of ΔH°298 for the reaction represented above?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
